function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased health anxiety due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being of individuals","Mitigation":"Provide mental health resources and support, promote accurate information on COVID-19","Technologies":"Online mental health platforms, fact-checking tools","People":"Individuals experiencing health anxiety","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Rapid increase in COVID-19 related searches and cyberchondria","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to misinformation and fake news","Mitigation":"Promote digital literacy, fact-checking, and critical thinking skills","Technologies":"Digital literacy campaigns, fact-checking tools","People":"Online users, social media users","Owner":"Educational institutions, media organizations"},{"Description":"Cyberchondria leading to sharing of unverified COVID-19 information","Impact":"Spread of misinformation and false health conceptions","Mitigation":"Promote critical evaluation of information, discourage sharing unverified information","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, information verification platforms","People":"Social media users, individuals with health anxiety","Owner":"Social media platforms, online communities"}]}
